gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 127, Lakers 113
gameRecap.excerpt: The Grizzlies defeated the Lakers, 127-113. Jaren Jackson Jr. recorded 31 points, nine rebounds, and three blocks for the Grizzlies, with Marcus Smart adding a season-high 29 points and eight 3PM in the victory. LeBron James (32 points, seven assists) and Anthony Davis (31 points, six rebounds) combined for 63 points for the Lakers in the losing effort. The Grizzlies improve to 12-23 in the regular season, while the Lakers have lost four in a row and fall to 17-19.
